00063 int main(int argc, char *argv[])
00064 {
00065     // Command line variables
00066     std::string dwiFileName;
00067     std::string vecFileName;
00068     unsigned int valFileName;
00069     std::string maskFileName;
00070     std::string labelFilename;
00071     std::vector<int> select_labels;
00072 
00073     std::string outMapFileName;
00074     std::string outFibersFileName;
00075 
00076     bool verboseMode;
00077     bool quietMode;
00078     bool saveTmpFiles;
00079     bool lps;
00080 
00081     unsigned int nbOfParticles;
00082     Real stepSize;
00083     Real epsilon;
00084     Real Kappa;
00085     Float seedSpacing;
00086 
00087     std::string inRadix;
00088 
00089 
00090     try
00091     {
00092         //
00093         // Program's command line parser definition
00094         //
00095 
00096             // Defines command line parser
00097             TCLAP::CmdLine cmd("BTK Tractography", ' ', "0.2");
00098 
00099             // Defines arguments
00100             TCLAP::ValueArg<std::string>   dwiArg("d", "dwi", "Dwi sequence", true, "", "string", cmd);
00101             TCLAP::ValueArg<unsigned int>   valArg("b", "b_values", "B-values", true, 1500, "unsigned int", cmd);
00102             TCLAP::ValueArg<std::string>  maskArg("m", "mask", "White matter mask", true, "", "string", cmd);
00103             TCLAP::ValueArg<std::string> labelArg("l", "label", "Label volume of seeds", true, "", "string", cmd);
00104             TCLAP::MultiArg<int>        labelsArg("", "labels", "Label select for processing", false, "int", cmd);
00105 
00106             TCLAP::ValueArg<std::string>    outMapArg("", "map", "Output connection map file", false, "map", "string", cmd);
00107             TCLAP::ValueArg<std::string> outFibersArg("", "fibers", "Output fibers file", false, "fibers", "string", cmd);
00108             TCLAP::SwitchArg lpsSwitchArg("", "lps", "Word coordinates expressed in LPS (Left-Posterior-Superior). By default RAS (Right-Anterior-Superior) is used.", cmd, false);
00109 
00110             TCLAP::SwitchArg verboseSwitchArg("", "verbose", "Display more informations on standard output", cmd, false);
00111             TCLAP::SwitchArg quietSwitchArg("", "quiet", "Display no information on either standard and error outputs", cmd, false);
00112             TCLAP::SwitchArg saveTmpSwitchArg("", "save_temporary_files", "Save diffusion signal, model coefficients, variance and spherical coordinates of gradient directions in files", cmd, false);
00113 
00114 
00115             TCLAP::ValueArg<unsigned int> particlesArg("", "number_of_particles", "Number of particles", false, 1000, "unsigned int", cmd);
00116             TCLAP::ValueArg<Real>    epsilonArg("", "resampling_threshold", "Resampling treshold", false, 0.01, "Real", cmd);
00117             TCLAP::ValueArg<Real>    stepSizeArg("", "step_size", "Step size of particles displacement", false, 0.5, "Real", cmd);
00118             TCLAP::ValueArg<Real>    KappaArg("", "curve_constraint", "Curve constraint of a particle's trajectory", false, 30.0, "Real", cmd);
00119             TCLAP::ValueArg<Real>    seedSpacingArg("", "seed_spacing", "Spacing in mm between seeds", false, 1.0, "float", cmd);
00120 
00121             // Parsing arguments
00122             cmd.parse(argc, argv);
00123 
00124             // Get back arguments' values
00125             dwiFileName    = dwiArg.getValue();
00126             valFileName    = valArg.getValue();
00127             maskFileName   = maskArg.getValue();
00128             labelFilename  = labelArg.getValue();
00129             select_labels  = labelsArg.getValue();
00130 
00131             outMapFileName    = outMapArg.getValue();
00132             outFibersFileName = outFibersArg.getValue();
00133 
00134             verboseMode  = verboseSwitchArg.getValue();
00135             quietMode    = quietSwitchArg.getValue();
00136             saveTmpFiles = saveTmpSwitchArg.getValue();
00137             lps          = lpsSwitchArg.getValue();
00138 
00139             nbOfParticles  = particlesArg.getValue();
00140             epsilon        = epsilonArg.getValue();
00141             stepSize       = stepSizeArg.getValue();
00142             Kappa          = KappaArg.getValue();
00143             seedSpacing    = seedSpacingArg.getValue();
00144 
00145 
00146             inRadix     = GetRadixOf(dwiFileName);
00147             vecFileName = inRadix + ".bvec";
00148     }
00149     catch(TCLAP::ArgException &e)
00150     {
00151         std::cout << "TCLAP error: " << e.error() << " for argument " << e.argId() << std::endl;
00152         std::exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
00153     }
00154 
00155 
00156     char displayMode = quietMode ? 0 : (verboseMode ? 2 : 1);
00157 
00158 
00159     //
00160     // Diffusion signal extraction
00161     //
00162 
00163         DTFPSignalExtractor *extractor = new DTFPSignalExtractor(vecFileName, dwiFileName, maskFileName, displayMode);
00164         extractor->extract();
00165 
00166         std::vector<Vector> *directions  = extractor->GetDirections();
00167         Sequence::Pointer       signal   = extractor->GetSignal();
00168         std::vector<Real>      *sigmas   = extractor->GetSigmas();
00169         Mask::Pointer           mask     = extractor->GetMask();
00170         Image::Pointer          baseline = extractor->GetBaseline();
00171 
00172         if(saveTmpFiles)
00173             extractor->save();
00174 
00175         delete extractor;
00176 
00177 
00178 
00179     //
00180     // Tractography (using particles filter)
00181     //
00182 
00183         // Get signal function
00184         DTFPSignal *signalFun = new DTFPSignal(signal, sigmas, directions, valFileName, baseline, displayMode);
00185 
00186         // Read label image if any and verify sizes
00187         LabelMapReader::Pointer labelReader = LabelMapReader::New();
00188         labelReader->SetFileName(labelFilename);
00189         labelReader->Update();
00190         LabelMap::Pointer labelVolume = labelReader->GetOutput();
00191 
00192 
00193         // Initialize output structures
00194         std::vector<int> labels;
00195         std::vector<vtkSmartPointer<vtkAppendPolyData> > fibers;
00196         std::vector<Image::Pointer> connectMaps;
00197 
00198 
00199         // Resample label map
00200         LabelResampler::Pointer labelResampler = LabelResampler::New();
00201         labelResampler->SetInput(labelVolume);
00202 
00203         LabelInterpolator::Pointer labelInterpolator = LabelInterpolator::New();
00204         labelResampler->SetInterpolator(labelInterpolator);
00205 
00206         LabelMap::SpacingType spacing = labelVolume->GetSpacing();
00207         LabelMap::SizeType size = labelVolume->GetLargestPossibleRegion().GetSize();
00208         size[0] *= spacing[0]/seedSpacing; size[1] *= spacing[1]/seedSpacing; size[2] *= spacing[2]/seedSpacing;
00209         labelResampler->SetSize(size);
00210 
00211         LabelMap::DirectionType direction = labelVolume->GetDirection();
00212         labelResampler->SetOutputDirection(direction);
00213 
00214         LabelMap::PointType origin = labelVolume->GetOrigin();
00215         labelResampler->SetOutputOrigin(origin);
00216 
00217         spacing[0] = seedSpacing; spacing[1] = seedSpacing; spacing[2] = seedSpacing;
00218         labelResampler->SetOutputSpacing(spacing);
00219 
00220         labelResampler->Update();
00221         LabelMap::Pointer resampledLabelVolume = labelResampler->GetOutput();
00222 
00223         // Apply filter on each labeled voxels
00224         LabelMapIterator labelIt(resampledLabelVolume, resampledLabelVolume->GetLargestPossibleRegion());
00225 
00226 
00227         // Apply filter on each labeled voxels
00228         LabelMapIterator it(labelVolume, labelVolume->GetLargestPossibleRegion());
00229 
00230         unsigned int numOfSeeds = 0;
00231 
00232         for(labelIt.GoToBegin(); !labelIt.IsAtEnd(); ++labelIt)
00233         {
00234             if(labelIt.Get() > 0 &&
00235                (select_labels.size() == 0 ||
00236                 *std::find(select_labels.begin(),select_labels.end(),labelIt.Get()) == labelIt.Get()) )
00237                 numOfSeeds++;
00238         }
00239 
00240         unsigned int numOfSeedsDone = 0;
00241 
00242         std::cout << std::fixed;
00243         std::cout << std::setprecision(2);
00244         Display1(displayMode, std::cout << "Running tractography..." << std::endl);
00245         for(it.GoToBegin(); !it.IsAtEnd(); ++it)
00246         {
00247             int label = (int)it.Get();
00248 
00249             if(label > 0 &&
00250                (select_labels.size() == 0 ||
00251                 *std::find(select_labels.begin(),select_labels.end(),label) == label) )
00252             {
00253                 Image::IndexType index = it.GetIndex();
00254 
00255                 itk::Point<Real,3> worldPoint;
00256                 labelVolume->TransformIndexToPhysicalPoint(index, worldPoint);
00257 
00258                 Mask::IndexType maskIndex;
00259                 mask->TransformPhysicalPointToIndex(worldPoint, maskIndex);
00260 
00261                 // If the seed is not in the mask, there is no need to continue this one
00262                 if(mask->GetPixel(maskIndex) != 0)
00263                 {
00264                     Point begin(worldPoint[0], worldPoint[1], worldPoint[2]);
00265 
00266                     // Set up filter's densities
00267                     DTFPImportanceDensity importance(signalFun);
00268                     DTFPAPrioriDensity    apriori(Kappa);
00269                     DTFPLikelihoodDensity likelihood(signalFun);
00270 
00271 
00272                     // Let's start filtering
00273                     Display1(displayMode, std::cout << "\tProgress: " << (Real)numOfSeedsDone / (Real)numOfSeeds * 100 << "%\r" << std::flush);
00274                     Display2(displayMode, std::cout << "Filtering label " << label << "..." << std::endl);
00275                     Display2(displayMode, std::cout << "\tSeed's world coordinates: (" << worldPoint[0] << "," << worldPoint[1] << "," << worldPoint[2] << ")" << std::endl);
00276                     Display2(displayMode, std::cout << "\tSeed's image coordinates: (" << maskIndex[0] << "," << maskIndex[1] << "," << maskIndex[2] << ")" << std::endl);
00277 
00278                     DTFPParticleFilter filter(signalFun, apriori, likelihood, importance, mask, signalFun->getSize(), signalFun->getOrigin(), signalFun->getSpacing(), nbOfParticles, begin, epsilon, stepSize, displayMode);
00279 
00280                     if(lps)
00281                         filter.SetLPSOn();
00282 
00283                     filter.run(label);
00284 
00285 
00286                     // Save data
00287 
00288                     assert(fibers.size() == connectMaps.size());
00289 
00290                     for(int l=fibers.size(); l<label; l++)
00291                         labels.push_back(-1);
00292 
00293                     if(labels[label-1] == -1)
00294                     {
00295                         fibers.push_back(vtkSmartPointer<vtkAppendPolyData>::New());
00296 
00297                         connectMaps.push_back(Image::New());
00298                         connectMaps.back()->SetOrigin(signalFun->getOrigin());
00299                         connectMaps.back()->SetSpacing(signalFun->getSpacing());
00300                         connectMaps.back()->SetRegions(signalFun->getSize());
00301                         connectMaps.back()->SetDirection(signalFun->GetDirection());
00302                         connectMaps.back()->Allocate();
00303                         connectMaps.back()->FillBuffer(0);
00304 
00305                         labels[label-1] = fibers.size()-1;
00306                     }
00307 
00308 
00309                     fibers[labels[label-1]]->AddInput(filter.GetFiber());
00310 
00311                     ImageIterator out(connectMaps[labels[label-1]], connectMaps[labels[label-1]]->GetLargestPossibleRegion());
00312                     ImageIterator  in(filter.GetConnectionMap(), filter.GetConnectionMap()->GetLargestPossibleRegion());
00313 
00314                     for(in.GoToBegin(), out.GoToBegin(); !in.IsAtEnd() && !out.IsAtEnd(); ++in, ++out)
00315                         out.Set(out.Get() + in.Get());
00316 
00317                     Display2(displayMode, std::cout << "done." << std::endl);
00318                 }
00319             }
00320         } // for each labeled voxels
00321         Display1(displayMode, std::cout << "\tProgress: 100.00%" << std::endl << "done." << std::endl);
00322 
00323         delete signalFun;
00324         delete directions;
00325         delete sigmas;
00326 
00327 
00328     //
00329     // Writing files
00330     //
00331 
00332         // Normalize and write connection map image
00333         for(unsigned int label = 0; label < labels.size(); label++)
00334         {
00335             if(labels[label] != -1)
00336             {
00337                 Real max = 0;
00338                 ImageIterator it(connectMaps[labels[label]], connectMaps[labels[label]]->GetLargestPossibleRegion());
00339 
00340                 for(it.GoToBegin(); !it.IsAtEnd(); ++it)
00341                 {
00342                     if(max < it.Get())
00343                         max = it.Get();
00344                 }
00345 
00346                 if(max > 0)
00347                 {
00348                     for(it.GoToBegin(); !it.IsAtEnd(); ++it)
00349                         it.Set(it.Get() / max);
00350                 }
00351 
00352                 try
00353                 {
00354                     std::stringstream filename;
00355                     filename << outMapFileName << "-" << label+1 << ".nii.gz";
00356 
00357                     ImageWriter::Pointer writer = ImageWriter::New();
00358                     writer->SetFileName(filename.str().c_str());
00359                     writer->SetInput(connectMaps[labels[label]]);
00360                     writer->Update();
00361                 }
00362                 catch(itk::ImageFileWriterException &err)
00363                 {
00364                     std::cout << "Error: " << std::endl;
00365                     std::cout << err << std::endl;
00366                 }
00367             }
00368         }
00369 
00370         // Write fiber polydata
00371         for(unsigned int label = 0; label < labels.size(); label++)
00372         {
00373             if(labels[label] != -1)
00374             {
00375                 unsigned int nbOfInputs = fibers[labels[label]]->GetNumberOfInputPorts();
00376                 bool saveFibers = true;
00377                 unsigned int i = 0;
00378 
00379                 do
00380                 {
00381                     if(fibers[labels[label]]->GetNumberOfInputConnections(i++) < 1)
00382                         saveFibers = false;
00383                 } while(saveFibers && i<nbOfInputs);
00384 
00385                 if(saveFibers)
00386                 {
00387                     std::stringstream filename;
00388                     filename << outFibersFileName << "-" << label+1 << ".vtk";
00389 
00390                     fibers[labels[label]]->Update();
00391                     vtkSmartPointer<vtkPolyDataWriter> writer = vtkSmartPointer<vtkPolyDataWriter>::New();
00392                     writer->SetInput(fibers[labels[label]]->GetOutput());
00393                     writer->SetFileName(filename.str().c_str());
00394                     writer->Write();
00395                 }
00396             }
00397         }
00398 
00399 
00400     return EXIT_SUCCESS;
00401 }
